001package org.consensusj.bitcoin.json.conversion;
002
003import com.fasterxml.jackson.core.JsonGenerator;
004import com.fasterxml.jackson.core.JsonProcessingException;
005import com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.JsonSerializer;
006import com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.SerializerProvider;
007import org.bitcoinj.base.Address;
008import org.bitcoinj.script.Script;
009
010import java.io.IOException;
011
012/**
013 *
014 */
015public class ScriptSerializer extends JsonSerializer<Script>  {
016    @Override
017    public void serialize(Script script, JsonGenerator gen, SerializerProvider serializers) throws IOException, JsonProcessingException {
018        gen.writeString(HexUtil.bytesToHexString(script.program()));
019    }
020}
